sekki.title: Start of spring
sekki.description: First hints of an approaching spring. The ground begins to thaw, fish appear in their icy ponds and the bush warblers start singing in the mountains.

sekki.title: Rain waters
sekki.description: Snow recedes, mist lingers in the air, and the grasses begin to sprout. Trees release their first buds as the ground soaks up meltwater.

sekki.title: Going-out of the insects
sekki.description: That time of year when the first bugs surface from their hibernation. Caterpillars start their transformation to butterflies.

sekki.title: Vernal equinox
sekki.description: When winter is gone and spring starts. Sparrows begin to nest in the trees. Cherry blossoms start to bloom. Heavy rains bring distant thunder.

sekki.title: Clear and bright
sekki.description: Shortly after the equinox, when the swallows return home and the geese fly north. The first rainbows of the season appear.

sekki.title: Rain for harvests
sekki.description: Reeds sprout by the rivers and rice seedlings grow in the fields after the last frost has passed. Peonies bloom in the wilderness.

sekki.title: Start of summer
sekki.description: The songs of summer begin. Frogs start their singing, and birds chirp in the forests. Worms surface from underground, bamboo shoots begin to sprout.

sekki.title: Small blooming
sekki.description: When flowers and plants start to come out. Silkworms start feasting on mulberry leaves, and the safflower workers start their picking. Wheat begins to ripen.

sekki.title: Seeds and cereals
sekki.description: The time of year when people start to seed the soil. Praying mantises hatch. Rotten grass become home to fireflies. The plums become more yellow.

sekki.title: Reaching summer
sekki.description: The longest days of the year. The sun reaches its highest point, accompanied by mist and rains. A sweet woodsy dryness hangs in the air. Irises bloom and crow-dippers start to sprout.

sekki.title: Small heat
sekki.description: The summer heat begins. Warm winds blow, lotus' blossom, and young hawks are learning to fly.

sekki.title: Big heat
sekki.description: Summer heat is at its strongest, followed by great rains. The air is thick and humid and the trees are busy making seeds.

sekki.title: Start of autumn
sekki.description: The first signs of autumn can be seen. Cooler winds blow, and thick fogs roll through the hills in the morning.

sekki.title: Lessening heat
sekki.description: The heat of summer has been forgotten. The rice has ripened and cotton flowers are in bloom.

sekki.title: White dew
sekki.description: When drops of dew can be seen on the grass. Swallows leave for the year, and the wagtails sing.

sekki.title: Autumnal equinox
sekki.description: Day and night are of equal length. Farmers drain their fields and insects hide underground.

sekki.title: Cold dew
sekki.description: Temperatures begin dropping. The geese return for the winter. Crickets chirp for the last time in the year.

sekki.title: Frosting
sekki.description: The first frosts. Rains disappear as the maple leaves and ivy turn yellow.

sekki.title: Start of winter
sekki.description: When the winter season starts. Land begins to freeze, rivers and streams shortly to follow.

sekki.title: Small snow
sekki.description: Light snowfall appears. Northern winds have blown the last leaves from the trees.

sekki.title: Big snow
sekki.description: The cold sets in. Bears are hibernating in their dens, and the salmon have swam upstream. Nature is quiet.

sekki.title: Winter solstice
sekki.description: When days are the shortest in the whole year. Deer in the mountains shed their antlers, and wheat sprouts rest underneath the snow.

sekki.title: Small cold
sekki.description: Winter chills start as the temperature quickly drops. Pheasant calls can be heard in the forest

sekki.title: Big cold
sekki.description: Temperatures drop low and the chill deepens. Ice thickens on the streams. Hens huddle together and begin laying eggs.
